trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETFOAL_00236_TALK_ACTOR<tab>Collecting a fledgling, are we? I'll need to see the proof of covering...
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETFOAL_00236_001_01<tab>Well, well! I see someone is ready to run! Here's your fledgling's registration form─the rest I leave to you.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETFOAL_00236_ERROR_001_01<tab>What's that? No proof of covering? <sigh> What did I just say?
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETFOAL_00236_ERROR_001_02<tab>To collect your newborn fledgling, you must present the proof of covering to Katering.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETFOAL_00236_ERROR_002_01<tab>Someone's awfully eager─too eager, that is. These things take time, in case you've forgotten.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETFOAL_00236_ERROR_002_02<tab>You cannot collect your fledgling prior to the date specified on your proof of covering.
